articles.description: The iPhone XS may have launched in 2018, but it's not exactly time to ditch it for the newer iPhone 11.
articles.content: The iPhone 11, which Apple announced in September 2019, is an impressive and relatively affordable handset with a fantastic camera and a fast processor. But those with an iPhone XS from 2018 may wond… [+8783 chars]

articles.title: Samsung’s rotating Sero TV goes on sale in the UK - The Verge
articles.description: Samsung’s Sero TV, which rotates between landscape and portrait orientations depending on what kind of content you want to watch, has gone on sale in the UK. Samsung says that the 43-inch TV is available for £1,599.
articles.content:
